description:
Are you planning to lead your organization to ISO 9001:2008 certification?

This course will help you to lead the implement ISO 9001:2008 standard in your organization. Your step by step implementation and certification guide. Topic include:

Six Step process of ISO 9001:2008 certification includes these steps:

Step 1: Get management commitment.

Step 2: Conduct the gap analysis and prepare documentation required for ISO 9001.

Step 3: Implement Quality Management System.

Step 4: Conduct internal audits.

Step 5: Select a certification Body and get the Pre-assessment audit done.

Step 6: Final certification audit.

In this course you will also learn about:

  • Clause by clause explanation of ISO 9001:2008 requirements in plain and simple language. (bonus)
  • Documentation strategies to avoid repeated revisions
  • QMS Implementation and external audit strategies
  • Dos and Don't during certification audit
